name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David WASHINGTON, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David WASHINGTON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Oscar N. Gaskins, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
534 A.2d 757
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David WASHINGTON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 13, 1987.
Decided Dec. 4, 1987.
Oscar N. Gaskins, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Frances Gralnek Gerson, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
